Chever was a Netherese archwizard and well-renowned mentalist.
Chever was an arcanist obsessed with discovering new things and retaining the knowledge of them.
Chever was born in  and established the Netherese enclave Opus at 39 years old. Upon Opus, he ordered the construction of universities, theatres, and other academic buildings. Chever was also interested in spell creation, and developed contact other plane in  and simulacrum 11 years later. Driven by his obsession with acquiring knowledge, he used his first spell to repeatedly contact extraplanar beings. Because of this, he was driven insane and jumped into a sphere of annihilation in .
